message.raw: change handling of JointCommand messages so you can send partial messages (i.e., not including gains or joint names every time). break sandia hand subscription into two subscribers, one for each hand. change the gains of the robot so it is strong enough to hold up the hands. gains are not that great, it's just a super quick attempt
